title: Parsing URLs in Go (Challenge)
description: The purpose of this challenge is to demonstrate how to parse URLs in Go.

meta.title: Parsing URLs in Go (Challenge)
meta.description: Learn how to parse URLs in Go, including extracting scheme, authentication info, host, port, path, query params, and query fragment.
meta.keywords: splithostport, go, go labs, go playground online, url parsing, net package, url components, go lab, go practice
